Now please create python script for table manipulation:
1 - Center aligned for header text
here's the VBA version
```
Sub CenterHeaderAllTables()
    Dim tbl As Table
    Dim hdrCells As Cells
    Dim c As Cell
    Dim minRow As Long
    
    For Each tbl In ActiveDocument.Tables
        
        ' Cari baris teratas yang memiliki cell (tidak peduli merge)
        minRow = tbl.Range.Cells(1).RowIndex
        
        ' Ambil semua cell yang koordinat row-nya = minRow
        Set hdrCells = tbl.Range.Cells
        
        For Each c In hdrCells
            If c.RowIndex = minRow Then
                c.Range.ParagraphFormat.Alignment = wdAlignParagraphCenter
                c.Range.Cells.VerticalAlignment = wdCellAlignVerticalCenter
            End If
        Next c
        
    Next tbl
    
    MsgBox "Header semua tabel sudah center aligned."
End Sub
```
2.  men-target kolom pertama (selain header) dan menghapus bold tanpa mengganggu tabel yang punya merged-cells vertikal maupun horizontal.
```
Sub UnboldFirstColumnBody()
    Dim tbl As Table
    Dim c As Cell
    
    For Each tbl In ActiveDocument.Tables
        For Each c In tbl.Range.Cells
            ' Kolom pertama = columnIndex = 1
            If c.ColumnIndex = 1 Then
                ' Skip header (baris pertama)
                If c.RowIndex > 1 Then
                    c.Range.Bold = False
                End If
            End If
        Next c
    Next tbl
End Sub
```
